titles.title: A bill to eliminate the discount on office equipment and furniture for Senators departing office.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10576)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 8/5/1993--Introduced. Repeals provisions authorizing U.S. Senators departing office (except by expulsion) to purchase office equipment and furnishings used in their former district offices.
